Item.comments: set language_effectivity to ALL where empty on "Document Section Document" rels
Item.method_code:
' Use Run Method action
' Data Administration tool Dim SQLstr As String = "" Dim inn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
SQLstr = SQLstr & " UPDATE [DOCUMENT_SECTION_DOCUMENT] Set [DOCUMENT_SECTION_DOCUMENT].language_effectivity='ALL' WHERE [DOCUMENT_SECTION_DOCUMENT].language_effectivity is null" Dim res as Item = inn.applySQL(SQLstr) If res.isError() Then Return inn.newError(res.getErrorString())
Return inn.newResult("DONE")
Item.name: SYS_DocuHierarchy AdminHelper04
